title: cultural_data_Museu_Picasso
text:
ï»¿App Link on Google Play: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.audioguiarte.museupicasso.
Application Name: Museu Picasso.
Number of Reviews: 8.00.
Application Description: Plan your visit to the Museu Picasso in Barcelona using this application. The app provides information for all artistic and educational programming at the museum. Learn about temporary exhibits, organize a visit that is adapted to your needs, and avoid long lines by buying your tickets online. Stay up to date with scheduling for activities and educational initiatives organized by the museum. Get a close-up look at its history, its collection, and how the annexation of various palaces has led to its current architectural configuration. The app is intuitive, flexible and attractive, featuring images, audio and video. Available in three languages (Catalan, Spanish and English).Read moreCollapse.
